name: The Memoirs of the Lost
description:
The Lost and The Found is a game about Life, Death, and the things that we carry with us along the way. Players will navigate a series of haunted houses as they find lost souls to send to the great beyond. Find traces of their old lifes by using your flashlight to find objects inside the houses.

W,A,S,D - Player Movement, Spacebar - Object Interaction, Period to generate a random level.

Global Game Jam 2021 Page!
